title: 'Druggable' mechanism of tau protein pathology discovered

title_detail.value: 'Druggable' mechanism of tau protein pathology discovered

summary: Researchers have uncovered a 'druggable' mechanism of pathological tau protein aggregation -- a significant advance toward finding an effective treatment for early-stage neurodegenerative diseases.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have uncovered a 'druggable' mechanism of pathological tau protein aggregation -- a significant advance toward finding an effective treatment for early-stage neurodegenerative diseases.
